name: A LONG TREK [DEMO]
description:
A LONG TREK is a story-focussed puzzle platformer, albeit in this demo you won't find much of that. What we do have instead though, is...

  • Momentum Movement - Moving feels fluid (whatever that means - I just thought it sounded neat)
  • Fun Puzzles - I suppose this one is subjective - some of the later levels rock!
  • Mysterious Setting - Is it a Temple? Or is it something else? OoooOoooooOooo

W, A and D / Left Arrow, Up Arrow and Right Arrow - Jump, Left and Right respectively

Right Mouse Button / Jump - Grapple (when you can!)

Escape - Pause the game and resume at any time! (No, it wasn't a command...)

Join our Discord, and discuss what we can do better and what you want to see in the future. We'd love to have you in our group! You can join it here.


Our Team

  • Leon - Coding and SFX (Twitter: @Its_Just_Lowe)
  • John - Art and Animations (Twitter: @bathropson)

Our Main Twitter: @DyludiumDigital
